description: A set of service endpoints used by the viewer.
title: Services

proxyUrl.description: An optional proxy to be used for dealing with same-origin issues. URL must either be a relative path on the same server or an absolute path on a server which sets CORS headers.
proxyUrl.title: Proxy URL

corsEverywhere.description: A boolean indicating that all services are CORS enabled. This is mutually exclusive with proxyUrl.
corsEverywhere.title: CORS Enabled

exportMapUrl.description: An ESRI service endpoint for generating map images. Should point directly to an endpoint that can be consumed by ESRI PrintTask.
exportMapUrl.title: Export Map URL

geometryUrl.description: A URL to an ESRI ArcGIS geometry service REST endpoint.
geometryUrl.title: Geometry URL

googleAPIKey.description: Google API key to enable geo location.
googleAPIKey.title: Google API URL

esriLibUrl.description: ESRI JavaSCript API endpoint. Note, we can't use a version greater than v3.22.
esriLibUrl.title: Esri Library Path

search.description: Search properties including ability to enable certain types of searches (National Topographic System, Postal Code/FSA, Scale/Ã‰chelle, and/or LAT/LNG), modify default GeoSearch settings (filtering, sorting, etc.) and to set service endpoint urls.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Filter the search results based on the type of the geographical names. Allowed values can be found here (if using the Canadian GeoNames Search Service API): http://geogratis.gc.ca/services/geoname/en/codes/concise.

sortOrder.title: Sort by categories
sortOrder.description: The sort order of the defined 'categories'. Any missing categories are appended to the bottom of the sorted list. The results can still be sorted through this option even if there are no categories being filtered.

maxResults.title: Maximum results
maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return per request. The Canadian GeoNames Search Service API has a 1000 search limit which will be used as an upper limit of results returned unless another service is being used with a higher limit. The default is 100 results.

officialOnly.title: Official names only
officialOnly.description: Whether to return only official names for the geographic names. Default is false which will return both official names and formerly official names.

disabledSearches.description: Enable specific types of searches including: National Topographic System, Postal Code/Foward Sorting Area or Latitude/Longitude (e.g. 58.12;-100.67).
disabledSearches.title: Search type to enable

search.title: Geo Search

titleValue.description: Value to appear by default. If value is empty, title will not be present even if Is present is selected.
titleValue.title: Value

showInfoSymbology.description: Indicates whether symbology from info sections should be included in export legend.
showInfoSymbology.title: Show Info Symbology

showControlledSymbology.description: Indicates whether symbology from controlled layers should be included in export legend.
showControlledSymbology.title: Show Controlled Symbology

columnWidth.description: Value in pixels to be used as the column width for the export legend.
columnWidth.title: Legend Column Width

footnote.description: Foot notice to add to exported map.

footnoteValue.description: Value to appear by default. If value is empty, footnote will not be present even if Is present is selected.
footnoteValue.title: Value

footnote.title: Footnote

timeout.description: A timeout delay in milliseconds after which the export image generation is considered to have failed. Defaults to 120sec.
timeout.title: Time Out

cleanCanvas.description: If set to true the export will omit layers and images that would cause issues with saving. If set to false users may need to save by right-clicking and selecting save image.
cleanCanvas.title: Clean Canvas
